results.content: I got exactly what I was expecting. A bit slow, as I had to play the vidoes at 1.75x speed. A good intro.
results.content_html: I got exactly what I was expecting. A bit slow, as I had to play the vidoes at 1.75x speed. A good intro.

results.content: Excellent presentation.  Very professional and polished.  The course could be more extensive and in-depth, but as an introduction to JavaScript Streams and RxJS it is very worthwhile.  I will seek out more courses by this instructor.
results.content_html: Excellent presentation. Very professional and polished. The course could be more extensive and in-depth, but as an introduction to JavaScript Streams and RxJS it is very worthwhile. I will seek out more courses by this instructor.

results.content: Great Primer on Streams. I recommend taking this course prior to taking a course on Angular 2+ / Reactive Programming.
results.content_html: Great Primer on Streams. I recommend taking this course prior to taking a course on Angular 2+ / Reactive Programming.

results.content: Great course, I think I learned a lot - the 'proof of the pudding' will come when I try to implement some of the detailed concepts in my own project. At least the material provided validates my decision to adopt an asynchronous, streams based design pattern for my current project.
results.content_html: Great course, I think I learned a lot - the 'proof of the pudding' will come when I try to implement some of the detailed concepts in my own project. At least the material provided validates my decision to adopt an asynchronous, streams based design pattern for my current project.
